revised_title: Observations on Bivalve Insects in Freshwater Ecosystems
tldr: The author describes the discovery and examination of a new species of bivalve insect found in freshwater ecosystems. The transparent, smooth, and white shell houses a unique and complex inhabitant with distinct antennae and movement capabilities. This new species is distinguished from other bivalve insects due to its smooth shell and transparent nature, which allows for better observation of its inhabitant.
